name: IKlikit Corporation
overview:
IKlikit Corporation Limited is a South African multinational information technology and electronics company co-headquartered in South Africa, Pietermaritzburg. Its products include personal computers, tablet computers, mobile phones, electronic storage, IT management, software and smart televisions.

After launching it social network in 2005 which didn’t do good at all. The company drifted to electronics and software development. The compant will be launching it first devices in the year 2012 called Flip Page. The line was of the devices was given by Lifa Bekwa the founder of the company which he meant: Flip through the next chapter and contiue.
